name: Mercedes-Benz AMG GLC43 Coupe
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz AMG GLC43 Coupe, a 5 seater Coupe, starts from  of Rs. 87.00 Lakh. It is available in 1 variant, with an engine of 2996 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. AMG GLC43 Coupe has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 7 airbags. Mercedes-Benz AMG GLC43 Coupe has a ground clearance of 201 mm  and is available in 6 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 9.5 kmpl for AMG GLC43 Coupe.
